name: Wanderer
source: Reward for inviting the Wanderer to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Hanega: Song of the Wind
skills.description: Deals 2 Anemo DMG. This character gains Windfavored.

skills.name: Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. If the character has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115061]</color> attached, then remove it and increase DMG by 1.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 7 {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>. If the character has <color=#FFFFFFFF>Windfavored</color> attached, then remove it and increase DMG by 1.
skills.description: Deals 7 Anemo DMG. If the character has Windfavored attached, then remove it and increase DMG by 1.
